com.paymill.services
Class ClientService

java.lang.Object
  com.paymill.services.ClientService

public class ClientService
extends Object

The ClientService is used to list, create, edit, delete and update PAYMILL Clients.

Since:
3.0.0
Author:
Vassil Nikolov

Method Detail

list

public PaymillList<Client> list()
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Client objects.

Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Clients and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Client> list(Integer count,
                                Integer offset)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Client objects, overriding the default count and offset.

Parameters:
count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
offset - Integer to start from.
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Clients and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Client> list(Client.Filter filter,
                                Client.Order order)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Client objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied.

Parameters:
filter - Client.Filter or null
order - Client.Order or null
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Clients and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Client> list(Client.Filter filter,
                                Client.Order order,
                                Integer count,
                                Integer offset)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Client objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied, overriding the default count and offset.

Parameters:
filter - Client.Filter or null
order - Client.Order or null
count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
offset - Integer to start from.
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Clients and their total count.

                                            String description)
Creates a Client object.

Parameters:
email - Mail address for the Client or null

Returns:
Client object, which represents a PAYMILL client.

update

public void update(Client client)
This function updates the data of a client. To change only a specific attribute you can set this attribute in the update request. All other attributes that should not be edited are not inserted. You can only edit the description, email and credit card. The subscription can not be changed by updating the client data. This has to be done in the subscription call.

Parameters:
client - A Client with Id.

delete

public void delete(Client client)
This function deletes a client, but its transactions are not deleted.

Parameters:
client - A Client with Id.

delete

public void delete(String clientId)
This function deletes a client, but its transactions are not deleted.

Parameters:
clientId - Id of the Client
